Module_TM1650.digit: show a digital in given position
Module_TM1650.setIntensity|param|dat: is intensity of the display, eg: 3
Module_TM1650.showDpAt: show Dot Point in given position
Module_TM1650.showHex: show a number in hex format
Module_TM1650.showHex|param|num: is number will be shown, eg: 123
Module_TM1650.showNumber|param|num: is number will be shown, eg: 100
